name: Dangerous Dave Champion's Edition
summary:
The entire Dangerous Dave collection is here! From the 1988 original to the 1990 PC classic to the final 2021 remaster, all nine of Dave's adventures are here in this Champion's Edition! Here is the treasure locked within:

1988 Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout
1990 Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout
1991 Dangerous Dave in the Haunted Mansion
1991 Double Dangerous Dave
1992 Dangerous Dave Returns
1993 Dangerous Dave's Risky Rescue
1993 Dave Goes Nutz!
1995 Dangerous Dave Goes Nutz!
2021 Dangerous Dave Remaster
Pirate's Treasure Map Hint Guide for Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout
Contains BOTH Windows and MacOS versions
